title: Staff Accountant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Drew University
Interview Descriptions: Asks you questions about your accounting background.  Really looks at your resume and evaluates how you convey yourself.  If you meet the requirements, management will consider hiring you. Will have to know excel as that is very important.
Interview Questions: How do you deal with stressful situations?

title: Instructor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Drew University
Interview Descriptions: Very pleasant experience. All faculty were very warm and inviting. I felt right at home when talking to everyone and everyone made it very easy. I would reccomend this employeer to other people
Interview Questions: What is your biggest weakness?

title: Resident Assistant (RA) Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Drew University (Madison, NJ) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was a quick interview over Zoom that took no longer than 20-25 minutes. There was only one person interviewing me, while the rest of the team later watched the recording of the interview.
Interview Questions: I was asked to give a presentation on how I was planning to build community as a Resident Assistant.

title: Student Worker- Information Technology Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Drew University (Madison, NJ) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Interview is simple. Demonstrate that you're confident and willing to do the work. It's not hard work, but you need to be a team player. Besides that, just relax and enjoy the conversation.
Interview Questions: Do you have customer service experience?

title: Tutor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Drew University
Interview Descriptions: It was very easy and comfortable. You just need to apply online and then you will have an in-person interview where they ask basic questions and your motivation of tutoring
Interview Questions: Why do you want to tutor at drew?

title: Adjunct Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Drew University
Interview Descriptions: Quick and easy. I was hired within two days. The human resources office was easy to communicate with and I did not have any issues. Overall, I had a positive interview experience.
Interview Questions: How long have you been teaching at the university level?

title: Finance Department Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Drew University (Madison, NJ)
Interview Descriptions:
Had a face to face interview with the manager and head of the department.
The interview still haunts me.  They said they wanted someone bubbly, but they don't.
They repeated that they were a fun bunch but I think they could tell I was seriously questioning that.
Overall the questions were pretty standard interview questions.
Interview Questions: How did you prepare for this interview?

title: Director of Procurement Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Drew University (Madison, NJ) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: Applied online through LinkedIn, got a call from an email from a recruiter a few days after. They set up and interview in person for the following week with the Director of HR and the Finance VP. Both very nice, professional women. Interview was a thorough hour long interview of my qualifications and job history. I was asked back a few weeks later to meet the rest of the staff for another hour long interview.
Interview Questions: Standard interview questions. Tell us about you. What's your management style? How do you say "no?"

title: Patrol Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Drew University
Interview Descriptions: Welcoming and informative interview but I knew they already had the guy they wanted half way through the interview. Passed over my relevant experience and seemed a more get to know us for the future, rather than wanting to hire me for this current opening. Met with the director and Lt. and they did most of the talking.
Interview Questions: How is your driving record?

title: Patrol Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Drew University
Interview Descriptions: Relatively quick hiring process and professional.  I was contacted via email after applying and given a date and time for my interview.  I then met with the Chief and Lieutenant.  I was then called for a second interview to meet with Chief, Lieutenant and a university administrator.
Interview Questions: General employment questions as well as public safety/law enforcement related questions.  Asked how past experience would best be applied to campus community.

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Drew University
Interview Descriptions: The Interview was very collegial and friendly. It was a typical 2 day interview including a talk and meeting with students. I was put up in campus housing rather than a hotel and the apartment was mold-ridden and triggered a bad allergic response. Only after I took the job did I discover it was all a false pretense and the dept. members were only pretending to get along.
Interview Questions: Did I realize how expensive it was to live in the area

title: Director of Operations Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at Drew University (Fort Worth, TX) in Sept 2015
Interview Descriptions: Leader ship and how we can improve business  more efficiently and to make customers happy.  I’m very excited to hopefully get another interview into work for you
Interview Questions: I have a lot of wins that I can bring to the company.  I would love to meet  The highest people in the company so we can figure out a game plan to grow the company successfully.

title: Student Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Drew University (Madison, NJ) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very easy. I was asked very basic questions about my temperament, work ethic, timeliness, and what I could offer their staff if I were to be hired.
Interview Questions: Why do I want to be a student technician?
